honors_and_awards.title: Best For The World 2019 - Overall and Community
CO Leadership Award 2019
honors_and_awards.description: SAUSALITO, Calif., March 26, 2019 /PRNewswire/ -- Pushing fashion to do better, Common Objective is recognizing apparel companies who set an inspirational example in best practices and sustainability. The CO Leadership Awards is broadly inclusive, spotlighting fashion companies which "have the courage to do the right thing – and do it well." Dhana Inc. is the sole apparel brand for youth to receive a CO Leadership Award and is honored to be part of a community of 110 brands and retailers who… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Best For The World Award 2018 - Overall and Community
Best For The World 2017 - Overall and Community
honors_and_awards.description: A total of 846 businesses across 52 industries from 48 countries are recognized on the full list of 2017 Best for the World honorees.

honors_and_awards.title: Best For The World 2016
honors_and_awards.publication: B the Change Media and B Lab
honors_and_awards.description: The ‘B Corp Best for the World’ list honors businesses that earned an overall score in the top 10% of all Certified B Corporations on the B Impact Assessment, a rigorous and comprehensive assessment of a company's impact on its workers, community, and the environment. A company must score over an 80 on the BIA to become a Certified B Corporation; the Best for the World lists honors the best of the best.

honors_and_awards.title: Top 10 Green Business People & Planet Award
honors_and_awards.description: The People & Planet Award recognizes businesses for their dedication to a green economy: a bottom line that includes protecting workers, communities, and the environment

honors_and_awards.title: SOURCE Awards 2012 Runner Up & Top 3 Companies in the World; Pioneers in Ethical Fashion for Childrenswear
honors_and_awards.description: Dhana EcoKids is proud to announce that we were honored as a Runner Up for the prestigious worldwide SOURCE Awards 2012 Childrens wear division. Our recognition was earned for new talent in fashion design combined with innovation in sustainability terms.

honors_and_awards.title: 2015 SOCAP Social Entreprenuer
honors_and_awards.description: "over 100 promising entrepreneurs who will be coming to SOCAP 2015 from over 35 countries from around the world. We recognize these entrepreneurs for their outstanding ideas, inspiring stories, and passion for creating sustainable business models."
